comment_body.0: Location: Seattle Washington Price range: 1000- 3000 usd Buy Project car Must haves: looking for a fast(ish) but most importantly fun to drive sports car Transmission: manual Inted use: project Vehicles considered: early gen VW tdi, mid 90s civics, Mazda miata NA I can do major work on this vehicle Additional notes: im 6 foot 6 inches so that may be an issue with some of these smaller vehicles. I'm looking for a long term project on a budget. I want a vehicle with big aftermarket support.
